General.Name: Curexo Inc
General.Description: Curexo Inc. engages in the development and sale of medical devices in Korea and internationally. Its products include ROBIN, a robot system that guides needle path induring CT-guided interventional procedure; Baidy, a medical device that assists labor by increasing intrauterine pressure which helps natural childbirth; artificial joint surgical robot; and Gait rehabilitation robot. The company also imports, distributes, and sells food and food additives. Curexo Inc. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
